docs.title: View docs in your browser
docs.text:
This repo is configured to let you optionally browse the documentation served locally with MkDocs.

Please follow these steps to view the docs with MkDocs.

  1. Install the mkdocs-material package Bash

    pip install mkdocs-material

  2. Run the mkdocs serve command from the root folder Bash

    mkdocs serve
    If you're running this repo in a GitHub Codespace, then you should be able to skip step 1.

docs.title: Step 1 of the first demo!
docs.text: Placeholder text to show how mkdocs renders things.
